item.title: Cannapages.com
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Save 15% or more with NCIA Membership
Cannapages.com is a Colorado-based research and development agency that tracks inventory, consumer purchasing, and market trends. NCIA members get 15% off ALL advertising costs for their online directory, as well as unique discounts on graphics, consultation, tracking systems, and more. We're proud to host and maintain the NCIA web site. Visit us online to see all of our Cannabis Business Resources.

item.title: Oaksterdam University
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 10% discount on tuition at Oaksterdam University Oaksterdam University is Americas first cannabis college, founded in 2007 to provide students with the highest quality training for the cannabis industry. Our faculty is comprised of the most recognized names in the California cannabis legalization movement. The school currently maintains campuses in Northern California, Los Angeles, and Michigan. For more information, visitÂ www.oaksterdamuniversity.com

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 10% off listing and fee for the first month at Weedmaps.com WeedMaps.com is a place where medical marijuana patients can connect with other medical marijuana patients to freely review local cannabis dispensaries. Find Your Bud with WeedMaps.com.

item.title: Cannabis Career Institute
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Free tuition for NCIA members and 50% off for their guests
Cannabis Career Institute is an innovator in the field of marijuana schools. We originated in March of 2009, following on the heels of and continuing the tradition of Oaksterdam University, the most successful marijuana school in the world. With more of a focus on business technique, Cannabis Career Institute has set the trend by creating a step-by-step method of compliance and providing it on a silver platter for students! The guidelines for how to create, brand and market a cooperative are all presented here along with options on what to do first, based on your timeline and budget. The goal of this marijuana school is empower the students by giving them the information they need to succeed in the world of cannabis. Whether they want to start their own medical marijuana delivery service, their own medical marijuana dispensary, their own medical marijuana edibles operation, their own medical marijuana grow-room or even their own medical marijuana school, Cannabis Career Institute is there to provide them with a strong network of experienced individuals to accomplish their goals. Our proven track record and list of successful marijuana businesses speaks for itself. At Cannabis Career Institute, your success is our success!
We are proud to offer our fellow NCIA members and their employees free admission into any class (normally $250) and 50% off for their guests. For more information, visitÂ www.cannabiscareerinstitute.com.

item.title: Dixie Elixirs & Edibles

item.content:encoded: 5% off Dixie Elixirs and Edibles for Colorado dispensaries Dixie Elixirs, LLC, based in Denver, CO, has been making premium carbonated MMJ drinks and MMJ edibles (âmediblesâ) since 2009. Focused on creating the highest quality MMJ products, Dixie distinguishes itself in the market for alternative MMJ treatments with natural ingredients, sophisticated flavors, and discreet packaging.

item.title: Guardian Data Systems

item.content:encoded: Guardian Data Systems provides a 10% discount on all hardware and software products and services as well as a FREE consultation for our fellow NCIA members.   Are you paying too much for processing? Â In most cases we can provide a significant savings over what you're paying right now and could save you thousands of dollars every year. Once a transaction has been approved, you'll have access to your funds within 24-48 hours. Use your existing terminal or convert your current credit card processing for FREE (PCI Compliant terminals only). Recurring and installment capabilities are available to automatically deduct funds from accounts on a timely basis and help you manage your account receivables. Guardian has the finest customer support in the industry â with Guardian you will receive customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. item.title: Steep Hill Labs, Inc.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Discounted pricing on cannabis analysis and consulting services Steep Hill Lab is the first independent medical cannabis screening facility in the United States founded to specifically serve the medical cannabis community.Â  Â With a mission to bring legitimacy to the medical cannabis industry while ensuring patient safety, Steep Hill Lab has tested over 16,000 samples of cannabis for potency, microbiological contamination and pesticides.Â  As the premier cannabis testing facility, Steep Hill Lab works with medical cannabis stakeholders to implement standards for quality control in California and the greater United States.Â  Additionally, they do consulting for the cannabis industry regarding best practices, safe packaging, distribution standards and product development. The constant innovation coming from Steep Hill Lab has created social change for the greater movement in its effort to provide safe cannabis medicine to patients around the United States.Â  Steep Hill Lab operates at the intersection of science, leadership, activism, technology and entrepreneurship in the medical cannabis industry. For more informationÂ about special pricing offered to NCIA members, call (510) 698-4446.

item.title: The Werc Shop
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Special pricing on cannabis lab testing The Werc Shop is the leading scientific source of information regarding medical cannabis. Â Our team comprises a Ph.D. in organic chemistry along with a M.Sc. in natural products chemistry boasting over 5 years of experience with medical cannabis. Â We have unparalleled expertise and experience and are proud to offer our skills and know-how to the medical cannabis community and fellow NCIA members. Â We provide many different consultation, development and product analytical testing services including cannabinoid profiling, terpenoid profiling, pesticide screening and rapid microbiological testing. Â We have rapid turn-around times that are enabled by our adoption of modern pharmaceutical analytical tools and know-how. We are proud to offer our services at a discount to fellow NCIA members who can contact us at (310) 703-9567Â to inquire further about their discount.

item.title: Denver Relief Consulting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: $500+ value with Denver Relief Consulting In 2009, we were standing in your shoes.Â There was a clear need in Colorado for medical marijuana, but the process of starting our own business was daunting. Fast forward to 2012, where Denver Relief has established itself as one of the preeminent dispensaries in the country. How did we get here? Thatâs a question for Denver Relief Consulting. From compliance to marketing, we have every aspect of forming your medical marijuana business covered. Making a mistake in this industry can leave you in fiscal and legal peril, so let us take some of the guesswork out of the process. Our team can help. Today. Stick to the 420PLAN with Denver Relief Consulting. NCIA members receive two hours of free consulting with any package of four or more hours of work. That's a $500+ value.Â Call (303) 420.PLAN or visitÂ www.DenverReliefConsulting.com.

item.title: Robert Raich, P.C.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 10% off legal consultation for California medical cannabis collectives Nationally renowned medical cannabis attorney, Robert Raich is offering 10% discounts on legal consultations to NCIA members. Call his Oakland law offices at (510) 338-0700 or visitÂ www.RobertRaich.com. (Limit: one discounted consultation per member.)

item.title: Rose Law Group, pc
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 10% Discount on legal fees with Rose Law Group pc Rose Law Group attorneys, planners and project managers have worked with medical dispensaries and cultivation businesses around the country, and are now prepared to assist an Arizona Medical Marijuana business in every aspect of their business.Â  From corporate formation, advising on the tax implications and non-profit status, to site selection, security issues, LEED certification, product regulations, Federal, State and Local enforcement risks to land use concerns and zoning plans for various sites, to input into the Department of Health Services regulations, employee handbooks, and regulations on hiring, RLG's Arizona Medical Marijuana Law Team is assisting the most sophisticated operators and is helping build those with less experience into viable business operations. Rose Law Group notifies all clients that this business is not currently legal under federal law. RLG provides the full range of legal risk analysis, due diligence, timeline concerns, etc. in order to give Arizona business owners the best opportunity to capture one of the limited medical marijuana licenses that will be issued in mid to late 2011 in the State of Arizona. For more details or to schedule a meeting please visitÂ our websiteÂ or contact Jordan Rose atÂ jrose@roselawgroup.com.

item.title: 420 Card Processing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 5% off credit card processing 420 Card Processing provides card services to merchants in the medical marijuana industry. Most banks are now refusing to process credit card transactions for these businesses despite the fact that they operate legally under the laws of their respective states. We feel it is wrong to deny equal opportunities to a class of legal businesses and have negotiated an agreement with a strong, committed bank to service our clients. We offer merchants the ability to register under the correct SIC code (avoiding the risk of cancellation), very competitive rates. We offer a 5% discount on services to our fellow NCIA members and have pledged to donate 10% of our profits to organizations that support medical marijuana legalization around the country. For more information, visit www.420cardprocessing.com.

The apps are customized for each dispensary so that its patients have access to exclusive deals, news, services, events, and more. VisitÂ www.mydispensaryapp.comÂ for more info or to inquire about a custom-made app for your dispensary.

item.title: CannLabs
item.content:encoded: 10% off cannabis lab testing! CannLabs is Colorado's leading medical cannabis analytical laboratory. As a proud member of NCIA, our lab offers a 10% discount on testing toÂ our fellow members in Colorado. (This offer doesn't apply to other discount programs.)

item.title: PharmPods
item.content:encoded: NCIA members, a revolution in organic agriculture has arrived. PharmPods are your plug-and-grow agricultural solution for delivering, high quality organic produce. Each PharmPod unit provides a fully customizable environment for hydroponic, aeroponic or soil-based growing and allows for cultivation of a variety of crops in a single pod. PharmPods are built using reclaimed shipping containers. We recondition each container to guarantee structural integrity and then outfit them with specialty, agricultural-grade lighting, irrigation, climate-control and ventilation for a grow-ready, stackable, scaleable, organic agricultural solution. By embracing the idea of Controlled Environment Agriculture (CEA), PharmPods help you realize maximum yield per harvest with a minimal physical and environmental footprint, ultimately allowing you to serve the need in todayâs marketplace for sustainable, low impact, high quality and locally sourced organic produce. We offer a 10% discount to NCIA members, potentially saving you thousands of dollars. Visit www.pharmpods.com for more information.

item.title: Mountain Medicine
item.content:encoded: Mountain Medicines provides quality edible medicines to Colorado MMCs. We are pleased to offer our fellow NCIA members a 10% discount on their orders.

item.title: Canna Security America
item.content:encoded: 10% off all MMED CCTV and alarm systems for NCIA members!Â Canna Security America (CSA) is a security solution company created in 2010 to address the growing needs of the evolving MMJ industry offering fully guaranteed MMED CCTV systems, alarm systems, and door access control as well as offsite video backup. CSA is happy to extend this 10% discount to our fellow NCIA members.

item.title: The Hemp Connoisseur
item.content:encoded: 15% off Advertising at the Hemp Connoisseur Magazine Coloradoâs premier guide to hemp culture, The Hemp Connoisseur strives to be a leading source of information for hemp and medical cannabis. Our focus has been on educating patients and consumers in general on all things related to hemp and MMJ. THC is distributed at 215 7-Elevens, Tattered Cover Bookstores, MMJ Evaluation Clinics, dispensaries, glass shops, and much more. THC is the only MMJ related publication that is distributed at 7-Eleven, where it is replenished weekly. Our distribution grows with each issue, between 40,000 to 50,000 copies per issue. We offer a 15% discount on advertising to our fellow NCIA members who stand with us in the effort to build a responsible and prosperous cannabis industry.
